column4: p.s. anyone knows how to make bootloader that allows choice between win xp and ubuntu?
grub didn't do that for you?
no, I get a bunch of warnings how it's modifyed version and this line grabed my eye "cdrecord: Operation not permitted. WARNING: Cannot set RR-scheduler
i get those to, but cdrecord is crazy. it doesnt end up saying "will start writing in 10..9 seconds " etc?
check #flood first. back in a couple of minutes
anything that cought your eye on the second output?
